section.name: Introduction
section.p:
jDTAUS Banking provides a common application programming interface to payment system specifications based on
jDTAUS Core. It is split into various artifacts providing flexible integration facilities. The Banking API artifact provides interfaces to various payment system specifications. Although not targeted solely on the german national payment system, currently most of the types are implementing concepts of it. As with all jDTAUS API artifacts the corresponding application runtime needs to be assembled manually. Whenever the Banking API artifact is used at compile time (whether pulled in transitively or requested), the application assembler needs to provide additional runtime artifacts (see below) for proper operation.

subsection.name: Textschlüssel Verzeichnis
subsection.p:
The "Textschlüssel Verzeichnis" artifact provides the jDTAUS TextschluesselVerzeichnis
reference implementation which is backed by classpath XML resources holding the runtime Textschlüssel instances.

subsection.name: Bankleitzahlen Verzeichnis
subsection.p:
The "Bankleitzahlen Verzeichnis" artifact provides the jDTAUS BankleitzahlenVerzeichnis
reference implementation.

subsection.name: DTAUS
subsection.p: The "DTAUS" artifact provides the jDTAUS DTAUS reference implementation.
